casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Allen, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellants.

[Cite as State ex rel. Allen v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 97.]

(No. 96-420 Submitted June 9, 1998 Decided September 9, 1998.) Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Steven P. Fixler, Assistant Attorney General, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State ex rel. Tapp v. Parsec, Inc. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 417, 696 N.E.2d 591, and the cause is remanded to the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
